statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Arabian Mocha coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${9.30} per pound with some Costa Rican coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${14.40} per pound to create \displaystyle{80} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${10.58} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound. pounds of Arabian Mocha coffee. pounds of Costa Rican coffee.
